import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material" import "./post.css" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" import { useState } from "react" export default function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike]=useState(post.like); const [isliked,setIsLiked]=useState(false); const PF=process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDOR; const likehandler=()=>{ setLike(isliked? like-1 :like+1); setIsLiked(!isliked) } return (
u.id=== post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id=== post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
